p: NEPA was developed as an oral fixed combination of the highly selective NK 1RA, netupitant (300 mg), and the clinically [ 4] and pharmacologically [ 11] distinct 5-HT 3RA, palonosetron (0.5 mg). The simultaneous targeting of two critical antiemetic pathways, in unison with the single dose administration results in a convenient antiemetic offering long-lasting protection from CINV.
